properties.entry: SELECT BRAND_NO , BRAND_NAME FROM BRAND WHERE CATEGORY_NO = ?
INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_NO , MEM_NO , CATEGORY_NO , BRAND , PRICE , DUE_DATE , OPEN_KAKAO , BOARD_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO IMAGE ( FILE_NO , BOARD_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , UPDATE_NAME , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? )
